home.title: Welcome to DevTools Hub
home.description: A collection of essential developer tools with the best UX/DX. All tools are free, require no login, and work instantly.

jsonFormatter.title: JSON Formatter
jsonFormatter.description: Format, validate, and minify JSON with real-time feedback
jsonFormatter.tip1: Paste your JSON and it will be automatically formatted
jsonFormatter.tip3: Use Cmd+C to copy the result
jsonFormatter.tip4: AI-powered TypeScript interface generation coming soon!

regexTester.title: RegExp Tester
regexTester.description: Test regular expressions with real-time matching and group capture
regexTester.tip1: Type your pattern and test string to see matches in real-time

base64.title: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
base64.description: Encode and decode text, images, and files to/from Base64
base64.dragDropFile: Drag & drop a file here, or click to select
base64.tip1: Paste text and click Encode to convert to Base64
base64.tip2: Paste Base64 string and click Decode to convert back to text
base64.tip3: Drag and drop images to convert to Base64
base64.tip4: Use Base64 for embedding images in HTML/CSS

jwtDebugger.title: JWT Debugger
jwtDebugger.description: Decode and verify JSON Web Tokens (JWT) with real-time feedback
jwtDebugger.subject: Subject
jwtDebugger.secretPlaceholder: Enter your secret key (HS256) or public key (RS256/ES256)...
jwtDebugger.securityWarningMessage: Never use production secrets! This tool runs in your browser. Only use for development/testing.
jwtDebugger.tip1: Paste a JWT token to decode and inspect its contents
jwtDebugger.tip2: The token is split into Header (algorithm), Payload (claims), and Signature
jwtDebugger.tip3: Check expiration time (exp) to verify if token is still valid
jwtDebugger.tip4: This tool can verify signatures with your secret key or public key
jwtDebugger.tip5: Use HS256/384/512 with a secret key, or RS256/384/512/ES256/384/512 with a public key
jwtDebugger.tip6: For RS256/ES256, paste your public key in PEM format (-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----)

errors.emptySecret: Secret or public key is required
errors.algorithmMismatch: Algorithm mismatch between header and key

timestampConverter.title: Unix Timestamp Converter
timestampConverter.description: Convert Unix timestamps to dates and vice versa
timestampConverter.tip1: Unix timestamp is the number of seconds since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 UTC
timestampConverter.tip2: Timestamps < 10000000000 are in seconds, >= are in milliseconds
timestampConverter.tip3: Use the current time button to get the current Unix timestamp
timestampConverter.tip4: All timezone conversions are accurate and account for daylight saving time

urlEncoder.title: URL Encoder/Decoder
urlEncoder.description: Encode and decode URLs with automatic detection
urlEncoder.inputPlaceholder: Enter URL or text to encode/decode...
urlEncoder.tip1: Use Encode URI for full URLs (e.g., https://example.com/path?key=value)
urlEncoder.tip2: Use Encode URI Component for individual parameters (e.g., query values)
urlEncoder.tip4: encodeURIComponent encodes all special characters except - _ . ! ~ * ' ( )

errors.noQueryString: No query string found in URL

uuidGenerator.title: UUID Generator
uuidGenerator.description: Generate UUID v1/v4 with bulk generation support
uuidGenerator.v4Description: UUID v4 is randomly generated using cryptographic randomness. Use this for most cases.
uuidGenerator.v1Description: UUID v1 is timestamp-based and includes the creation time. Can be sorted chronologically.
uuidGenerator.tip1: UUID v4 is randomly generated and is the most commonly used
uuidGenerator.tip2: UUID v1 is timestamp-based and can be used to sort by creation time
uuidGenerator.tip3: Click on any UUID to copy it to clipboard
uuidGenerator.tip4: Use 'Copy All' to copy all UUIDs at once (one per line)

errors.GENERATION_ERROR: An error occurred while generating UUIDs
errors.BULK_GENERATION_ERROR: An error occurred during bulk generation
errors.INVALID_CHARACTERS: UUID must contain only hexadecimal characters (0-9, a-f)
errors.FORMAT_ERROR: An error occurred while formatting UUID
errors.PARSE_ERROR: An error occurred while parsing UUID
